--- Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:

> Trelos, realizing he was now free from that city, decided it would be
> best to return to his master.  He dog-paddled as fast as he could 
> toward the other side of the ocean and soon was far away from the 
> base. 
> 
> He swam to the surface when was safely away from the base and put out
> a call to Hydras. "Master Hydras, I have freed myself from the 
> confines of the Maximal base. I will return to your location 
> momentarily."

From behind Trelos a dark shape moved through the water swiftly rising
through the waters, picking up speed as it did so. When it reached the
surface a black shark fin rose from the water denoting its position, it
began moving in Trelos' direction. 

Even as the shark moved a message came through from Hydras ... 

> Hydras:
> 
> "Good, come back to base and dont stop until you two are here" said 
> Hydras while he had a open channel to Myrmidon

Myrmidon transmitted back, (Trelos may be able to pick it up if he
chooses) "I believe I have located your wayward Trelos. I am closing on
his position now." Myrmidon paused and then spoke over his radio, his
voice grave and thoughtful. "If you plan on doing anything with that
Rodimus bot, you had better do it soon. Atlantis is under siege by a
wave of warriors from the skies. Rodimus may be a moot point soon, as
well as the rest of the city."

Preston
(Myrmidon)
